chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
s: SF_seq
eps: R
x: R

Goal:
SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_down s x)) < eps

Premises:
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
seq_step = fun s : seq R => foldr Rmax 0 (pairmap (fun x y : R => Rabs (y - x)) (head 0 s) (behead s)) : seq R -> R Argument scope is [seq_scope]
SF_h = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_cut_down = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_down ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
SF_last_cat : forall x0 y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x0) (SF_lx x0) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x0 y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x0 y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R eps : R |- Type]
SF_cat_pointed : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> pointed_subdiv x -> pointed_subdiv y -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cat x y)
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
seq_step_cat : forall x y : seq R, (0 < size x)%nat -> (0 < size y)%nat -> last 0 x = head 0 y -> seq_step (x ++ behead y) = Rmax (seq_step x) (seq_step y)
SF_sorted = fun (T : Type) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop) (s : SF_seq) => sorted Ord (SF_lx s) : forall T : Type, (R -> R -> Prop) -> SF_seq -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
sorted_last : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= last x0 s
ptd_cons : forall (h : R * R) (s : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv (SF_cons h s) -> pointed_subdiv s
SF_behead = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := head (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s)); SF_t := behead (SF_t s) |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
zip_unzip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq (S * T)), zip (unzip1 s) (unzip2 s) = s
SF_rev = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_make (rev (SF_lx s)) (rev (SF_ly s)) (SF_rev_0 s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
sorted_incr : forall (s : seq R) (i j : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i <= j)%nat -> (j < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= nth x0 s j
seq_step_ge_0 : forall x : seq R, 0 <= seq_step x
nth_le_seq_step : forall (x0 : R) (l : seq R) (i : nat), (S i < size l)%nat -> Rabs (nth x0 l (S i) - nth x0 l i) <= seq_step l
SF_cut_up = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_up ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
unzip1_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size s) (size t) -> unzip1 (zip s t) = s
SF_last_lx : forall (x0 : ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), fst (SF_last x0 s0) = last 0 (SF_lx s0) where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R eps : R |- Type]
SF_last = fun (T : Type) (y0 : T) (s : SF_seq) => last (SF_h s, y0) (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, T -> SF_seq -> R * T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
size_rev : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (rev s) = size s
SF_lx_rev : forall s0 : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_rev s0) = rev (SF_lx s0) where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R eps : R |- Type]
SF_size_lx : forall s0 : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s0) = S (SF_size s0) where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R eps : R |- Type]
seq_step_rev : forall l : seq R, seq_step (rev l) = seq_step l
SF_rcons = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) (t : R * T) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := rcons (SF_t s) t |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R * T -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]

```coq
intros.
pose proof (SF_sorted Rle s) as sorted_s.
pose proof (pointed_subdiv s) as ptd_s.
pose proof (sorted_last (SF_lx s) _ _ sorted_s x) as H1.
pose proof (sorted_last (SF_lx s) _ _ sorted_s (last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s))) as H2.
pose proof (sorted_dec (SF_lx s) _ _ sorted_s x H1) as [i [H3 H4]].
pose proof (SF_cut_down_pointed_subdiv s x) as ptd_cut.
rewrite SF_last_cat with (x0 := s) (y := SF_cut_down s x).
rewrite SF_last_lx.
simpl.
pose proof (seq_step_cat (SF_lx s) _ _ H2) as H5.
rewrite H5.
apply Rle_trans with (Rmax (seq_step (SF_lx s)) (seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_down s x)))).
apply seq_step_ge_0.
apply seq_step_ge_0.
Qed.

original: intros. pose proof (SF_sorted Rle s) as sorted_s. pose proof (pointed_subdiv s) as ptd_s. pose proof (sorted_last (SF_lx s) _ _ sorted_s x) as H1. pose proof (sorted_last (SF_lx s) _ _ sorted_s (last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s))) as H2. pose proof (sorted_dec (SF_lx s) _ _ sorted_s x H1) as [i [H3 H4]]. pose proof (SF_cut_down_pointed_subdiv s x) as ptd_cut.
